info.+content: Misaki Ayuzawa is the first female student council president at a once all-boys school turned co-ed. She rules the school with strict discipline demeanor. But she has a secret—she works at a maid cafe due to her families circumstances. One day the popular A-student and notorious heart breaker Takumi Usui finds out her secret and makes a deal with her to keep it hush from the school in exchange for spending some time with him.
2011-01-06 to 2011-02-14 (Philippines, League of Astig on QTV Ch. 11)
TBSアニメーション・「会長はメイド様！」公式ホームページ
